sentence.Network_en: The historian Yakut described it picturesquely as a "mother of castles".
sentence.Network_cn: 历史学家雅库特把它形象地描述为“城堡之母”。

sentence.Network_en: In the building trade such a trader is picturesquely described as a & quot ; brass plate & quot ; merchant.
sentence.Network_cn: 在建筑行业里,这样一个生意人可以被生动地描述 为著 名商人.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 反常的：perverse生动地，形象化地：picturesquely后代，后世：posterity

entry.tran: 风景如画的；有自然美景的
entry.def: A picturesque place is attractive and interesting, and has no ugly modern buildings.

example.ex: Alte, in the hills northwest of Loule, is the Algarve's most picturesque village.
example.tran: 位于洛莱西北部山区的阿尔特，是阿尔加维风景最美丽的村庄。

entry.tran: （词语或表达）别致的，生动的，富有诗意的
entry.def: Picturesque words and expressions are unusual or poetic.

example.ex: Every inn had a picturesque name — the Black Locust Inn, the Blueberry Inn.
example.tran: 每个旅馆都有一个别致的名字，如“洋槐树旅馆”、“蓝莓旅馆”。

sentences.sentence: "in the building trade such a trader is picturesquely described as a `brass plate' merchant"

auth_sentence.content: The shallow streamlet came tumbling picturesquely over gray stones.
auth_sentence.res_content: The shallow streamlet came tumbling picturesquely over gray stones.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The shallow streamlet came tumbling picturesquely over gray stones.

auth_sentence.content: Not until his second year at university, he confided, as he sat planted picturesquely amid the students.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Not until his second year at university, he confided, as he sat planted picturesquely amid the students.
